_sText: A recreation of my friend's house. Includes front yard, back yard, side yards, pool, water slide (with invisible ladder), basement, garage, 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom, utility room, crawlspace (under stairs). Good map for zombie mod, or just normal deathmatch. I made this map for my friend's zombie hell server, and mainly am uploading for him to get it DL'd, but you guys are welcome (and encouraged) to download it to!
